titleStmt.title: Dialogorum sacrorum libri quatuor autore Sebastiano Castalione, qui nunc postremò opus recognouit ; argumenta singulis dialogis præposuit, & sententias subiecit ; ex quibus pueri discant officium ; hoc est, quid imitandum sit, aut declinandum.
titleStmt.author: Castellion, Sébastien, 1515-1563.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
